_source.short_desc: Automated and easy-to-use reporting platform for digital agencies. Build visual cross-channel marketing reports your clients will love.
_source.long_desc: Automated and easy-to-use reporting platform for digital agencies. Build visual cross-channel multi-account marketing reports your clients will actually read. Automate data collection from all your marketing channels; Have all your performance metrics in one place with a single click; Align your team and clients with scheduled and on-demand reports, shared access, and real-time viewing;  Save time on the boring manual data pulling and reporting tasks so you could focus on performance.
_source.pricing_details:
Professional: $179 / month billed annually

Premium: $269 / month billed annually

Custom: Custom pricing
_source.target_audience: Whatagraph is created with digital agencies and their clients in mind. Our automated cross-channel marketing reports answer the need of all agency workers: from data analyst to account manager to CEO.

media.caption: Connect data and build visual reports
Monitor multi-channel marketing data in real-time
Real-time dashboards to monitor daily performance
Super intuitive & easy to use drag & drop editor

category_features.name: Data Management
category_features.definition: Ability to handle large datasets

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Client Management
category_features.definition: Manage company interactions with current customers

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Data Connectors
category_features.definition: Integrate or connect different data sources/applications/platforms for analysis and dashboard preparation

category_features.name: Data Visualization
category_features.definition: Graphical representation of the data

category_features.name: Functions/Calculations
category_features.definition: Perform various mathematical calculations using the data

category_features.name: KPI Monitoring
category_features.definition: Tracking the status of previously identified performance measurements

category_features.name: Private Dashboards
category_features.definition: Share dashboard screen within private user groups

category_features.name: Public Dashboards
category_features.definition: Publish dashboard publicly on various platforms

category_features.name: Scorecards
category_features.definition: Capture statistical records to measure achievements or progress towards  a particular goal.

category_features.name: Widgets
category_features.definition: An extended application or connectors that enables users to perform additional services with their current set of tools

category_features.name: AB Testing
category_features.definition: Create two versions of emails, forms, or actions and gauge which is more effective

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: AB Testing
category_features.definition: Create two versions of emails, forms, or actions and gauge which is more effective

category_features.name: Customizable CTAs
category_features.definition: Create unique call-to-actions to drive clicks (buttons, banners, graphics, etc.)

category_features.name: Drip Campaigns
category_features.definition: Create a path to complete a specific goal and guide leads based on the time between actions

category_features.name: Dynamic Content
category_features.definition: Create marketing content that changes based on the viewer

category_features.name: Landing Pages/Web Forms
category_features.definition: Create an online form to capture new lead information

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: ROI Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor conversion rates and analyze effectiveness and profitability of marketing efforts

category_features.name: Sales Analytics
category_features.definition: Track in detail how users interact with your campaigns and pages (scrolling, button interactions, etc.)

category_features.name: Search Marketing
category_features.definition: Track visibility and traffic from search engines

category_features.name: Segmentation
category_features.definition: Group leads or contacts based on their specific characteristics

category_features.name: Social Marketing
category_features.definition: Manage campaigns and track engagement for marketing efforts across social media channels

category_features.name: Website Visitor Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor activity of individuals who visit your website using cookies

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Data Connectors
category_features.definition: Connect to big data sources

category_features.name: Data Import/Export
category_features.definition: Export reports and associated data into Excel

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.definition: Generate statements to gauge performance and financial position (ie. income statement, balance sheet)

category_features.name: Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions based on past and present data/trends

category_features.name: Marketing Reports
category_features.definition: Reports specific to marketing and associated campaigns

category_features.name: OLAP
category_features.definition: Online Analytical Processing, analyze different dimensions for data discovery (complex calculations, what ifs, etc)

category_features.name: Sales Reports
category_features.definition: Reports specific to sales analysis for trends and strategies

category_features.definition: Set a time to generate routine reports automatically

category_features.definition: View different and/or more detailed information within a certain data set

category_features.definition: Track and interpret campaign performance metrics

category_features.name: Competitor Monitoring

related_products.short_desc: Design and publish anything in a few clicks. From brochure to video, access thousands of templates, images, videos, and more for free.
related_products.features: Design isn't just for designers. It's for anyone with ideas to share. Canva is the online platform that makes designing anything easy, for every individual and team. With thousands of professionally made templates to get you started, you can create, customize, and share your designs in a few clicks. From stickers to professional brochures, stunning videos to workplace presentations, it's never been easier to achieve your design goals.

related_products.short_desc: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution that helps visualize data-connected business process flows, empower remote teamwork, and more
related_products.features: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution with a robust library of templates and shapes, data connectivity capabilities, and integrated collaboration tools to empower remote workers and teams anywhere. Create impactful visualizations using provided shapes and starter files.  Edit diagrams stored online simultaneously with colleagues through a web browser to work with others anywhere securely and effortlessly. Even connect diagrams to real-time data to make decisions quickly.

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense is a full-scale reporting & analytics solution that lets business users visualize, explore & drive insights from complex data
related_products.features: Sisense goes beyond traditional business intelligence by providing organizations with the ability to infuse analytics everywhere, embedded in both customer and employee applications and workflows. Sisense customers are breaking through the barriers of analytics adoption by going beyond the dashboard with Sisense Fusion - the highly customizable, AI-driven analytics cloud platform, that infuses intelligence at the right place and the right time, every time.

related_products.short_desc: Powerful statistical software everyone can use to analyze data and find meaningful solutions to their toughest business problems.
related_products.features: Minitab Statistical Software is a powerful statistical software everyone can use from anywhere. Visualize, analyze and harness the power of data with Minitab. Our comprehensive and trusted analyses combined with unparalleled ease-of-use make it simple to get deep, accurate insights. From quality and reliability engineering to product development, business and predictive analytics to process validation, Minitab is your partner to help solve your toughest challenges and bring your success to life.

related_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your business data.
related_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

related_products.short_desc: Domo?s visualization tools enable a consolidated view so you can easily conduct analysis, create interactive visualizations, and unders
related_products.features: Domo visualization tools enable a consolidated view so you can easily conduct analysis, create interactive visualizations, and understand, tell, and share real-time stories about your business. Create pie charts, graphs, interactive maps, and other visualizations of your data with just a few clicks. When you upload a data source, Domo Analyzer tool suggests a visualization for you to get you started.

related_products.short_desc: Qlik Sense is a business intelligence (BI) and data visualization platform that helps global enterprises move faster and work smarter.
related_products.features: Qlik Sense is world-class data visualization software that helps global enterprises move faster, work smarter and put modern analytics in everyone's hands. Easily combine, load, visualize, and explore data, no matter how large (or small). Create and share powerful, interactive dashboards in a governable environment. Get unmatched performance and scalability on enterprise SaaS, your cloud of choice, or on-premises. Accelerate your path to business value with the most complete BI platform.

related_products.short_desc: Marketing attribution software allows businesses to track the impact of every customer interaction they participate in.
related_products.features: Marketing attribution software allows businesses to track the impact of every customer interaction they participate in.

similar_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your business data.
similar_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

similar_products.short_desc: A SaaS based reporting solution that helps digital marketers build reports with PERFORMANCE INSIGHTS in writing, all in a few seconds.
similar_products.features:
DataMyth is a SaaS based reporting solution which helps digital marketers generate reports with AUTOMATED ANALYSIS & PERFORMANCE INSIGHTS in writing, which helps marketers understand what is working & what is not.  Marketers can save all the time spent building reports and analysing the data, and get the reports in a few seconds. 

With the time saved, digital marketers can focus on optimization & strategy while we take care of all reporting needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Toucan is a cloud-based, guided analytics platform built to reduce the complexity of bringing insights from data to business users.
similar_products.features:
Toucan is a cloud-based, guided analytics platform with one goal in mind: reduce the complexity of bringing insights from data to business users. 

The Toucan team has worked from day one to make every experience on the platform simple, fast, and understandable even for complex tasks. As a result, Toucan sees the highest user adoption in the industry at 90%.

Toucan is designed for business leaders and business analysts who need to make decisions quickly and on any device.

similar_products.short_desc: JMP is the data analysis tool of choice for hundreds of thousands of scientists, engineers and other data explorers worldwide.
similar_products.features:
JMP, data analysis software for Mac and Windows, combines the strength of interactive visualization with powerful statistics.  

Importing and processing data is easy. The drag-and-drop interface, dynamically linked graphs, libraries of advanced analytic functionality, scripting language and ways of sharing findings with others, allows users to dig deeply into their data, with greater ease and speed.

similar_products.short_desc: Classify360 is a data management & governance platform for highly regulated, data-heavy industries.
similar_products.features:
Classify360 centralizes data management & governance by rapidly identifying, normalizing, and classifying data across on-prem and cloud sources - protecting data that strengthens a business and remediating the data that weakens it. 

Classify360 provides content-level visibility into protected, proprietary, public, internal, and stale data.  Through simple workflows and custodian-driven data management, organizations can mitigate risk, maintain compliance, and gain control over data sprawl.

similar_products.short_desc: Informer 5 is a robust, extensible, end-to-end data discovery and analytics platform connecting all your on-prem and cloud data.
similar_products.features: Informer 5 is a robust, embeddable data discovery and analytics platform that simplifies the process of accessing, cleansing, blending, and analyzing data. Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics.

similar_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
similar_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

similar_products.short_desc: Dataddo is a data integration platform that lets users get data to wherever it needs to go - dashboards, warehouses, or business apps.
similar_products.features:
Dataddo is a no-code data integration platform that offers 3 main products:
- Data to Dashboards: Send data from apps to dashboarding tools. (Free version available)
- Data Anywhere: Send data from apps to warehouses and dashboards, between warehouses, and from warehouses into apps.
- Headless Data Integration: Build your own data product on top of the unified Dataddo API.
From first login to complete, automated pipelines, get your data flowing from sources to destinations in just a few clicks.

similar_products.short_desc: Cluvio is a modern powerful SQL and R-based cloud analytics platform that allows creating and sharing beautiful interactive dashboards.
similar_products.features: Cluvio is a modern data analytics platform that lets you run SQL queries against your database, process data in R, visualize the results and create beautiful, interactive dashboards in minutes. With pricing optimized for startups and small companies, it is easy and cost effective to share insights with everyone in your company or your customers. Cluvio also supports powerful embedding that allows you to add analytical features easily to any website or web application.

similar_products.short_desc: Power My Analytics is a reporting automation tool that enables digital marketers to collect data and integrate metrics where needed.
similar_products.features: Power My Analytics is a reporting automation tool that enables digital marketers to collect data from popular advertising, social media, email, shopping, CRM, and other platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Microsoft Ads, Twitter, LinkedIn, Mailchimp, Amazon, Shopify, and more, then integrate the metrics they need into their favorite data destinations, including Google Data Studio, Google Analytics, Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, Google BigQuery, and/or SQL.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve alignment and uncover new insights. With Supermetrics, organizations can visualize data in customizable templates and reports.
similar_products.features:
Supermetrics streamlines the aggregation of data from 80+ sales and marketing platforms and visualizes them into customizable templates and reports.

Organizations use Supermetrics to gain data-driven insights, make better decisions, and improve alignment across departments.

Even non-technical users can rely on our connectors to create ad-hoc analyses and capture relevant data. +700k marketers use Supermetrics in over 120 countries.

similar_products.short_desc: For rapid production and analysis of presentation ready biplots, correspondence, mdpref and MCA maps.  64 bit program for PCs and MACs.
similar_products.features: The choice of professional researchers worldwide for user friendly, rapid analysis and production of presentation ready biplots, correspondence, mdpref and MCA maps. 64 bit program runs on PCs and MACs.  Our exclusive Brand Projector I calculates and graphically displays the attribute changes necessary for brand (column) re-positioning to any point on a map.  Brand Projector II allows a researcher to interactively change attributes (rows) and watch the Brand (column) move in response.

similar_products.short_desc: Industrial Internet of Things edge computing platform for Industry 4.0 data to create SCADA and visualization products.
similar_products.features:
Industrial Internet of Things edge computing platform to develop and deploy your own SCADA HMI visualization product using .NET and Web.
Data historian to MSSQL Server, SQL Azure, Oracle, mySQL, MongoDB, MariaDB, PostgreSQL, SQLite, InfluxDB and CSV files.
IoT Gateway for Industry 4.0 data to Modbus, OPC DA, OPC UA Siemens S7, ControlLogix, CompactLogix, GuardLogix, Micro800, MicroLogix, SLC 500, PLC-5, and MTConnect.
Cloud computing for MQTT, Azure IoT Data Hub and Edge, and AWS IoT Gateway.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Embedded Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Embedded Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Embedded Analytics software allows users to integrate analytical capabilities with the applications they already use and access analytical tools from within these applications.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: With over two million landing pages at an average conversion rate of over 16%, Instapage is helping leading brands across 100 countries
related_products.features: Instapage is the world's most advanced landing page platform, helping digital advertisers create more relevant and impactful advertising by making it easy to build conversion-optimized landing pages in minutes. With Instapage, marketers can maximize conversions by creating, personalizing, optimizing landing pages at scale, automatically connecting ads with relevant post-click pages, and delivering insights to drive the highest growth possible from digital ad campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Workamajig is the only project management tool made specifically for creative teams. See why over 3,000 marketing teams use Workamajig.
related_products.features: Workamajig is a fully integrated advertising agency software built for the specific needs of creative teams. Its multiple features include project management, resource & task management, accounting & finance, CRM sales, and more. See why more than 3,000 creative teams, including many fortune 500 companies rely on Workamajig everyday. Get rid of your multiple marketing tools and start using Workamajig today. Less Stress. More Profits. Schedule a free demo and see the benefits for yourself!

related_products.short_desc: Hightail lets you share files, get feedback and take projects from concept to completion.
related_products.features: Hightail is built for team collaboration on creative content with features that allow you to send large files, preview content (such as PDFs, videos and images), collect precise feedback, assign tasks, monitor activity with team dashboards, control versions and route approvals. Hightail helps teams to reduce the amount of time it takes to review work, keeping projects on track, and is easy for any team member to use, whether inside or outside your organization, while keeping content secure.

related_products.short_desc: Creatopy is an ad design platform that helps businesses customize, automate and scale up their ad production and delivery.
related_products.features: Featuring advanced automation and customization capabilities, along with an ever-growing library of templates and original visual elements, Creatopy gives you the tools you need to spark your creative journey and keep your visual content organized and always on-brand.

related_products.short_desc: MediaRadar is a customizable advertising intelligence platform that is targeted to the needs of media sellers, buyers, and planners.
related_products.features: MediaRadar's award-winning advertising intelligence solutions deliver timely cross-media insights that are targeted to those that are involved in the media selling, planning, or buying processes. Media selling teams rely on MediaRadar to prospect for new business, create compelling pitches and connect with the right buyers. Agencies and marketers use MediaRadar to create the best media mix, monitor their competitors, and uncover new advertising opportunities.

related_products.short_desc: Use monday.com Work OS to create, distribute, and manage your display ad campaigns, and centralize all your work processes.
related_products.features: Use monday.com Work OS to take your display advertising to the next level. Plan and manage simple and complex advertising campaigns, utilize gathered data to optimize your marketing tactics, and collaborate in real-time. monday.com is more than an advertising solution, it is a completely customizable platform for all your work processes. With no-code automations, ready-made templates, and visual dashboards you can streamline workflows and customize the platform to fit your exact needs.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based sales enablement solution that helps businesses with the distribution of ads, sales prediction, and team usage reporting.
related_products.features: Winmo tracks decision-makers who control $100 billion in marketing spend, mapping brand and agency teams to the budgets they control, along with buying windows and opportunity triggers that allow users to reach the right prospects at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Google Ads tool for freelancers & small to medium Digital Agencies which makes optimisation suggestions backed by data.
related_products.features:
Opteo is a Google Ads management tool which recommends optimisations based on continuous account monitoring of account performance data. Optimisations can be launched with a single click as pushes changes to Google Ads automatically, without the need to switch between interfaces.

Opteo includes over 40 different optimisations including: manage keyword bids, control budgets, optimise ad schedules, get real-time alerts, analyse search terms and more!

related_products.short_desc: Digital market intelligence company used by 100,000s of businesses for global cross-device strategic insights.
related_products.features:
Shine a light on the digital world with Similarweb. The platform that helps business leaders, analysts, and marketers easily discover the best opportunities, identify potential threats, and make business-critical decisions to grow website traffic and revenue.

Our easy-to-use Digital Marketing and Research Intelligence products help you define your strategy and win more market share efficiently. 

Outpace your competition and industry by benchmarking your digital performance against competitors

similar_products.short_desc: EXADS is a scalable solution for networks, publishers and advertisers to build and fully customise their own self service ad platforms.
similar_products.features: Trusted by networks, advertisers and publishers alike, EXADS is a powerful and easy to use ad server that will take your advertising business to new heights. Our ad server is fully customisable with your brand name, logo, look & feel and unique ad serving domain. Use our powerful APIs to automate repetitive tasks to save you time. Secure and reliable at 99.9% uptime with lightning fast ad responses, EXADS is a robust platform serving 12+ billion ad impressions daily.

similar_products.short_desc: Connected TV functions like paid search and social-allowing you to launch self-managed campaigns that focus on conversions and revenue.
similar_products.features: Connected TV functions like paid search and social-allowing you to launch self-managed campaigns that focus on conversions and revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily manage your PPC accounts with automated recommendations, unique data views, and fast implementation. Simple, Yet Powerful.
similar_products.features:
Easily manage your PPC accounts at scale with automated recommendations, unique data views, and fast implementation.

Adalysis is built to get you out of data crunching and into optimizations by pointing you directly at what needs to be addressed. 

Ads are automatically tested. Accounts are automatically scanned for any missing best practices. You can build your own data scans. Implementing large scale changes takes only a few keystrokes. Powerful PPC management has never been this simple.

similar_products.short_desc: Storyteq helps creative and marketing teams deliver their dynamic asset production to multiple channels across multiple platforms.
similar_products.features:
Storyteq's cloud-based Creative Automation platform helps digital creative leads and marketing teams in top global brands and creative agencies scale their creative production for premium videos, HTML5 banners, display advertising, and statics.

Turn your master files into dynamic templates right from Adobe After Effects or from within our Template Builder and upload them to multiple advertising channels straight from our platform.

similar_products.short_desc: With over two million landing pages at an average conversion rate of over 16%, Instapage is helping leading brands across 100 countries
similar_products.features: Instapage is the world's most advanced landing page platform, helping digital advertisers create more relevant and impactful advertising by making it easy to build conversion-optimized landing pages in minutes. With Instapage, marketers can maximize conversions by creating, personalizing, optimizing landing pages at scale, automatically connecting ads with relevant post-click pages, and delivering insights to drive the highest growth possible from digital ad campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Workamajig is the only project management tool made specifically for creative teams. See why over 3,000 marketing teams use Workamajig.
similar_products.features: Workamajig is a fully integrated advertising agency software built for the specific needs of creative teams. Its multiple features include project management, resource & task management, accounting & finance, CRM sales, and more. See why more than 3,000 creative teams, including many fortune 500 companies rely on Workamajig everyday. Get rid of your multiple marketing tools and start using Workamajig today. Less Stress. More Profits. Schedule a free demo and see the benefits for yourself!

similar_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
similar_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Creatopy is an ad design platform that helps businesses customize, automate and scale up their ad production and delivery.
similar_products.features: Featuring advanced automation and customization capabilities, along with an ever-growing library of templates and original visual elements, Creatopy gives you the tools you need to spark your creative journey and keep your visual content organized and always on-brand.

similar_products.short_desc: Use monday.com Work OS to create, distribute, and manage your display ad campaigns, and centralize all your work processes.
similar_products.features: Use monday.com Work OS to take your display advertising to the next level. Plan and manage simple and complex advertising campaigns, utilize gathered data to optimize your marketing tactics, and collaborate in real-time. monday.com is more than an advertising solution, it is a completely customizable platform for all your work processes. With no-code automations, ready-made templates, and visual dashboards you can streamline workflows and customize the platform to fit your exact needs.

similar_products.short_desc: AdSanity is a lightweight ad rotator plugin for WordPress that allows users to create and manage advertisements.
similar_products.features: AdSanity is a lightweight ad rotator plugin for WordPress. It allows you to embed ads in your content and around your website and generate reports to track how each ad performs. We have integrations with popular WordPress products like Elementor, Beaver Builder, and Divi. And we have even developed workflows to sell ads directly on your site with form-building platforms like Gravity Forms. If you need help, our top-notch support team will jump in to help you get the most out of AdSanity.

similar_products.short_desc: An easy-to-use, cloud based, advertising system for the blogger generation. Schedule, rotate, and track ads.
similar_products.features: AdPlugg is a modern, cloud-based ad server system that makes it easy to serve ads to your website or blog. Thousands of magazines, newspapers, and other sites use AdPlugg to manage, serve and track their online ads. Simply drop AdPlugg tags anywhere in your site where you want ads to appear. Then upload and control your ads from your dashboard at adplugg.com. Target, rotate and schedule ads from any source with ease. View high quality charts and reports showing impressions, clicks, and CTR.

similar_products.short_desc: Display advertising management is easy with templates. Create powerful and engaging display adverts with ease.
similar_products.features: Display advertising plays a crucial role in securing brand recall and recognition. With our Display advertising templates, banner creations is at ease. With a combination of pre-designed templates and automated workflows, brand consistency is secured across any platform or channel. Create, publish and manage from one single location, no design or programmatic skills necessary. Do changes in real-time and stay message relevant 24/7. Efficiency and cost savings are at ease.

similar_products.short_desc: Ad-trade platform that gives you maximum control of your campaigns in a smarter way
similar_products.features: Ad-trading platform that gives you maximum control of your campaigns in a smarter way. We combine advanced RTB Technology, machine learning, analytics & AI to set new standards in transparency and ease of using advertising technology in a streamlined manner.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Ad Server software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Ad Server tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Ad Server software helps marketers manage their advertisement across different advertising channels. In addition to tracking performance of different ad copies, Ad Server software enables presenting the most relevant copies to a chosen audience on a specific website or device.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.description: Marketing Analytics software collects and processes data needed for performance evaluation and strategic planning within marketing departments.
